articles.title: DPRK FM Back Home
articles.content:
DPRK FM Back Home
 Pyongyang, March 8 (KCNA) -- DPRK Foreign Minister Ri Su Yong returned home Tuesday after taking part in the 31st Session of the UN Human Rights Council held in Geneva.

articles.title: DPRK Delegation Back Home
articles.content:
DPRK Delegation Back Home
 Pyongyang, March 8 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the Ministry of People's Security of the DPRK led by Minister Choe Pu Il returned home on Tuesday after visiting Laos.

articles.title: Romanian Delegation Here
articles.content:
Romanian Delegation Here
 Pyongyang, March 8 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the Socialist Party of Romania headed by Chairman Constantin Rotaru arrived here Tuesday.

articles.title: Floral Tribute Paid to Statues of Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Floral Tribute Paid to Statues of Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il
 Pyongyang, March 8 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the Socialist Party of Romania visited the statues of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il on Mansu Hill on Tuesday.
					 The guests laid bouquets before the statues and paid tribute to them.

articles.title: National Meeting Held to Mark Int'l Women's Day
articles.content:
National Meeting Held to Mark Int'l Women's Day
 Pyongyang, March 8 (KCNA) -- A national meeting took place at the People's Palace of Culture on Tuesday to mark the 106th March 8 International Women's Day.
					 Present at the meeting were Choe Ryong Hae, Yang Hyong Sop, and officials concerned, women officials and members of the women's union here.
					
					 Present there on invitation were overseas Korean women, women of foreign embassies and missions of the international organizations here and foreign guests.
					
					 Choe Ryong Hae, member of the Political Bureau and secretary of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK), made a report.
					
					 He said that in the more than one century since the March 8 International Women's Day was instituted, world progressive women have struggled for genuine peace, democracy, true rights and dignity of women and a great advance has been made in the development of the world women's movement.
					
					 The reporter went on:
					
					 The Korean women's movement started and has recorded a history of victory along with the glorious course of the Korean revolution under the leadership of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il.
					
					 Kim Il Sung put forward the unique idea of the women's movement, gave the origin to the Juche-oriented Korean women's movement and established its brilliant tradition during the arduous anti-Japanese revolutionary struggle,.
					
					 After the liberation of the country Kim Il Sung formed the Democratic Women's Union of Korea involving broad strata of women and personally drew up and promulgated the Law on Sex Equality, the first of its kind in history.
					
					 The President authored a lot of works, providing important guidelines for finally settling the issue of women and wisely leading the struggle for implementing them.
					
					 The history of the Korean women's movement is associated with the undying exploits performed by outstanding leader of the Korean women's movement Kang Pan Sok and anti-Japanese war hero Kim Jong Suk who devoted their all to the social emancipation of the women.
					
					 Kim Jong Il preserved and glorified Kim Il Sung's idea of the women's movement and leadership exploits and developed the Korean women's movement on to a new higher stage.
					
					 Today the Korean women's movement is greeting a new heyday in its development under the leadership of Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					 The women should make positive contributions to ushering in the greatest heyday of building a thriving socialist nation and building a reunified power, dignified and prosperous, on this land.
					
					 The reporter called for boosting international unity and solidarity with the world progressive women struggling for dignity and rights of women and world peace and stability in the idea of independence, peace and friendship.

articles.title: Performance Given by National Folk Art Troupe
articles.content:
Performance Given by National Folk Art Troupe
 Pyongyang, March 8 (KCNA) -- A music and dance performance was given by the National Folk Art Troupe at the Ponghwa Art Theatre on Tuesday, the 106th March 8 International Women's Day.
					 Among the audience were women officials of merits, members of the women's union here and their families.
					
					 Present there on invitation were overseas Korean women, women of foreign diplomatic envoys and representatives of international organizations here and their spouses and foreign guests.
					
					 The performance began with prologue "Women Are Flowers." Put on the stage were female quintet "Song of Women", female quartet and chorus "Moranbong" and other colorful numbers.
					
					 The performers represented reverence for President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il who provided the flower garden attaching importance to women and respecting them on this land and glorified the name of the Korean women before the times and history.
					
					 Also put on the stage were numbers showing the boundless glory and happiness of holding Marshal Kim Jong Un, who is protecting the bright laugh and future of the Korean women and the rising generation, in high esteem as the father of the large socialist family.
					
					  Festive atmosphere revved up when audience also presented some numbers on the stage.

articles.title: 2016 Women's Football Day Marked in DPRK
articles.content:
2016 Women's Football Day Marked in DPRK
 Pyongyang, March 8 (KCNA) -- An event took place in the DPRK to mark the AFC Women's Football Day-8 March 2016.
					 Present there were women coaches and advisers from different sports teams, juvenile sports schools and Pyongyang International Football School and former women football stars.
					
					 Participants attended a training course in the global trend of football development and the role of coaches and advisers in games and training of reserves before watching a video clip on an international game.
					
					 Then, they played a football match.
					
					 Pang Yong Su, deputy secretary of the DPRK Football Association, told KCNA that March 8 was set as the AFC Women's Football Day last year and diverse activities have been conducted by football associations in different countries with March 8 as an occasion.
					
					 People's Athlete Ri Kum Suk, a former forward of the women's world XI, said that she was deeply moved to play the match with her old colleagues, noting that she would devote herself to the women football development in the country.

articles.title: International Women's Day Marked in DPRK
articles.content:
International Women's Day Marked in DPRK
 Pyongyang, March 8 (KCNA) -- The women in the Democratic People's Republic of Korea significantly enjoy the March 8 International Women's Day.
					 In this regard, Chae Chun Hui, vice-chairwoman of the Central Committee of the Democratic Women's Union of Korea, told KCNA:
					
					 The Korean women have grown up to be a reliable force pushing one of the two wheels of the revolutionary chariot, under the care of the great leaders.
					
					 President Kim Il Sung paid deep attention to the women's movement in each period of the revolution, and under his warm care, the women had performed great feats in the efforts for the nation's prosperity.
					
					 The Korean women's movement greeted its heyday under the guidance of leader Kim Jong Il. 
					
					 Kim Jong Il defined the character of the Korean women's movement and clearly indicated the orientation and ways for finally settling the women's issue, energetically leading the work to do so.
					
					 Even in the last days of his life, he worked heart and soul to develop the women's union into a powerful organization in the Songun (military-first) era, showing warm care for women of various strata, including the wives of servicepersons.
					
					 Supreme leader Kim Jong Un saw to it that the 4th National Meeting of Mothers was convened on the occasion of the first Mother's Day (November 16, 2012). He also appreciated together with women a concert given in celebration of the International Women's Day.
					
					 On his initiative, such edifices for the interest of women were built across the country as workers' hostel of Kim Jong Suk Pyongyang Textile Mill, Breast Tumour Institute of the Pyongyang Maternity Hospital and Okryu Children's Hospital.
					
					 It is a good luck and greatest happiness for us, women, to have had the great leaders who take loving care of our destiny and future.

articles.title: Kumgangsan Cosmetics Exhibition in DPRK
articles.content:
Kumgangsan Cosmetics Exhibition in DPRK
 Pyongyang, March 8 (KCNA) -- The Kumgangsan Cosmetics Exhibition in Moranbong District, Pyongyang draws many visitors, mainly men, on the March 8 International Women's Day. 
					 According to Jong Kum Suk, a saleswoman at the exhibition, most of the cosmetics on sale are "Kumgangsan"-trademarked ones produced by the Pomhyanggi Joint Venture Company.
					
					 They include lotion, aqueous cream, perfume and eye shadow, made with domestic materials and technology.
					
					 The exhibition now serves those cosmetics packed with boxes of various size and color carrying flowers and letters "Happy International Women's Day".
					
					 In the country it has become a usual practice to present bouquets and souvenirs to the women on every International Women's Day and Mother's Day (November 16).
					
					 The Kumgangsan Cosmetics Exhibition was opened in Juche 96 (2007).

articles.title: Tele-Questioning and Answering Service to Start in DPRK
articles.content:
Tele-Questioning and Answering Service to Start in DPRK
 Pyongyang, March 8 (KCNA) -- Officials, scientists and technicians in the agricultural sector of the DPRK have recently completed a tele-questioning and answering system for farming techniques throughout the country.
					 The system makes it possible to have real-time interchange of technical problems between the Ministry of Agriculture, scientific institute, different agricultural organs and co-op farms through local network.
					
					 Last year, a local network for its trial service was set up between different counties, proving very efficient.
					
					 Tele-questioning and answering service will soon start on a nationwide scale.

articles.title: Newspapers Call for Giving Full Play to Revolutionary Spirit of Korean Women
articles.content:
Newspapers Call for Giving Full Play to Revolutionary Spirit of Korean Women
 Pyongyang, March 8 (KCNA) -- Newspapers here Tuesday dedicate editorials to the 106th March 8 International Women's Day, the revolutionary holiday of the working women all over the world.
					 An editorial of Rodong Sinmun says: There took place fundamental changes in the destiny and position, ideological and moral traits and role of the Korean women who were once subject to national contempt, deprivation of political rights, social inequality and feudal fetters and a new history respecting women began on this land thanks to President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il.
					
					 Today the Korean women are remaining true to the idea and leadership of Marshal Kim Jong Un with the same clean conscience and sense of obligation as the women guerrillas displayed when devotedly protecting the headquarters of revolution during the anti-Japanese war and a woman party member of Rakwon and an old woman of Thaesong did by trusting and following only the party and the leader with single-minded loyalty.
					
					 The devoted services being rendered by the Korean women with clean conscience as the roots of the country at all times, whether they are known or unknown and rewarded or unrewarded, add to the dynamism of the Korean revolution and push the country to fresh leap forward and prosperity.
					
					 All the women should deeply cherish the mission and tasks they assumed before the era and history and give fuller play to the revolutionary spirit of the Korean women in the on-going general offensive.
					
					 Minju Joson calls on the Korean women to become honorable victors in the 70-day campaign of loyalty under the leadership of Kim Jong Un and thus fully demonstrate once again before the world their revolutionary spirit in glorifying the Seventh Congress of the Workers' Party of Korea as the glorious one of victors and ushering in the golden age of building a thriving nation.

articles.title: Key Resolve and Foal Eagle 16 Flailed by Newspapers
articles.content:
Key Resolve and Foal Eagle 16 Flailed by Newspapers
 Pyongyang, March 8 (KCNA) -- Newspapers in the DPRK Tuesday strongly denounce the U.S. and the south Korean puppet forces for kicking off the largest-ever Key Resolve and Foal Eagle 16 joint military exercises.
					 Rodong Sinmun in an article terms the drills an adventurous saber-rattling gravely wrecking peace on the Korean peninsula and stability in Northeast Asia and increasing the danger of a nuclear war.
					
					 The rehearsals are time bombs increasing the danger of the second Korean war, a nuclear war, the article notes, and goes on:
					
					 The warmongers are undisguisedly threatening the DPRK by opening to media war equipment involved in the exercises, while vociferating about massive introduction of special warfare forces, "all-out mobilization of horrible weapons" and "occupation" of the whole areas of the north.
					
					 The above-said saber-rattling will inevitably lead the north-south relations to the brink of war.
					
					 We will never remain a passive onlooker to the criminal war moves of the U.S. imperialists and the south Korean puppet warmongers disturbing peace on the peninsula and blocking the cause of peaceful reunification.
					
					 The powerful strategic and tactical strike means of the powerful revolutionary Paektusan army are waiting for the signal flares of the final battle, sharply watching the saber-rattling of the provocateurs.
					
					 Minju Joson in a commentary says the Korean army and people will clearly show what a real war is like to the aggressors and warmongers running wild like wolves bereft of reason to realize their purposes for aggression.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Blasts Traitor Park Geun Hye for Cooking up Evil Law
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Blasts Traitor Park Geun Hye for Cooking up Evil Law
 Pyongyang, March 8 (KCNA) -- Traitor Park Geun Hye of south Korea let the lawmakers from the "Saenuri Party" railroad the "anti-terrorism bill" through the "National Assembly" (NA) on Mar. 2 despite strong public protest and criticism.
					 Commenting on this, Rodong Sinmun Tuesday says:
					
					 The puppet traitor's fabrication of the "anti-terrorism law" is an unpardonable political provocation to tarnish the image of the dignified DPRK and a hideous and reckless fascist action to mercilessly eliminate the progressive democratic forces by labeling them "terrorist forces."
					
					 The above-said law is unprecedented in the law-making history of south Korea.
					
					 By origin, the "anti-terrorism bill" had been tabled at the NA in 2001 but thrown at once into a dustbin in the face of strong public uproar and protest.
					
					 But the Park group finally made the law by stirring up "terror" throughout the south Korean society under pretext of the DPRK's bolstering of nuclear deterrent for self-defence and legitimate right to explore space.
					
					 Thrown into the abyss of thorough isolation and ruin, Park buckled down with her sleeves rolled up to fabricating the "anti-terrorism bill" in a bid to focus the public attention on the north-south confrontation and tighten her dictatorial rule.
					
					 It is her ulterior design to serve the whole term of her office and let the conservative regime stay in power for an indefinite period at any cost by ushering in another dark era of "yusin" for the purpose of indiscriminately suppressing the people through the Intelligence Service as her father did in the past. 
					
					 Fascism and dictatorship can by no means be justified.

articles.title: Halt to U.S.-S. Korea Joint Military Exercises Demanded
articles.content:
Halt to U.S.-S. Korea Joint Military Exercises Demanded
 Pyongyang, March 8 (KCNA) -- The South Side Committee for Implementing the June 15 Joint Declaration held a press conference in Seoul on March 7 to denounce the U.S. and south Korean puppet warmongers for kicking off the provocative joint military exercises against the north, according to Thongil News, an internet paper of south Korea.
					 At the press conference the organization accused the south Korean and U.S. forces of repeatedly announcing their plans to scatter leaflets in the areas of the north along the Military Demarcation Line during the drills while vociferating about a preemptive strike at the north,  "beheading operation" aimed to strike the headquarters of the north and "drill for advancing toward Pyongyang".
					
					 It demanded the authorities stop at once the Key Resolve and Foal Eagle 16 joint military exercises and roll back the policy for escalating the confrontation with the compatriots in the north.

articles.title: Director for Women's Affairs of C.C., AINDF Denounces Park Geun Hye's Country-selling Rule
articles.content:
Director for Women's Affairs of C.C., AINDF Denounces Park Geun Hye's Country-selling Rule
 Pyongyang, March 8 (KCNA) -- The director for Women's Affairs of the Central Committee of the Anti-Imperialist National Democratic Front (AINDF) released a statement on Tuesday, the March 8 International Women's Day, according to website Kuguk Jonson.
					 The statement said that the south Korean women are subject to all sorts of insult and maltreatment, misfortune and pain under the more than 70 year-colonial rule of the U.S. and due to the present authorities' policy of mistreating the women.
					
					 It called on the women in the south to dynamically wage the pan-national women's movement to put a definite end to the treacherous rule of Park Geun Hye chiefly to blame for the social trend and political system of despising the women.

articles.title: S. Koreans Oppose Deployment of THAAD
articles.content:
S. Koreans Oppose Deployment of THAAD
 Pyongyang, March 8 (KCNA) -- Citizens in Wonju City, Kangwon Province of south Korea, declared an action against the moves of the U.S. and the puppet regime to deploy THAAD.
					 The All-Citizens Measure Committee grouping civic and public organizations in Wonju City held a press conference at the Wonju City Office on March 2.
					
					 At the press conference the organization chided the discussion of Wonju City as a site for deploying THAAD.
					
					 If THAAD is deployed despite the protest, all citizens will turn out in a death-defying action against the deployment, it warned.

articles.title: Protest Actions Staged outside U.S., S. Korean Embassies in Tokyo in Japan
articles.content:
Protest Actions Staged outside U.S., S. Korean Embassies in Tokyo in Japan
 Tokyo, March 7 (KNS-KCNA) -- Officials of the Korean Youth League in Japan staged actions outside the U.S. and south Korean puppet embassies in Tokyo in protest against the Key Resolve and Foal Eagle 16 joint military exercises kicked off by the U.S. and the Park Geun Hye group of traitors on March 7.
					 After holding a rally condemning the drills, the officials of the youth league adopted a written protest and formed a protest group of Koreans in Japan.
					
					 Then they staged a protest action against the U.S embassy.
					
					 They thrust a written protest to the embassy before marching toward the south Korean puppet embassy.
					
					 The representatives of the protest group thrust a written protest to the embassy, bitterly condemning Park Geun Hye, confrontational maniac and traitor for all ages, for trying to bring a nuclear disaster to the Korean nation.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's New Year Address Carried by Swedish Magazine
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's New Year Address Carried by Swedish Magazine
 Pyongyang, March 8 (KCNA) -- The gist of the New Year Address made by supreme leader Kim Jong Un was carried by the Swedish magazine Korea Information No. 1.

articles.title: Day of Sun to Be Marked in Nigeria
articles.content:
Day of Sun to Be Marked in Nigeria
 Pyongyang, March 8 (KCNA) -- A Nigerian preparatory committee for celebrating the 104th birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung (the Day of the Sun) was formed in Abuja on March 1.
					 Ibrahim Mantu, member of the Credit Committee of the People's Democratic Party of Nigeria and chairman of the Nigeria-Korea Friendship Association, was elected chairman of the preparatory committee.
					
					 The committee decided to give wide publicity to the revolutionary career and exploits of the President and the successes made by the service personnel and people of the DPRK in defending the sovereignty of the country and building a thriving socialist nation and organize a meeting, lecture, film show and other political and cultural events on the occasion of the anniversary.

articles.title: DPRK Praised by UK Organization
articles.content:
DPRK Praised by UK Organization
 Pyongyang, March 8 (KCNA) -- The British Association for the Study of Songun Policy recently posted on its website special write-ups illustrated with a photo of Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					 Recalling the DPRK succeeded in its first H-bomb test, an article titled "Strength of DPRK" said that the stirring event clearly showed the spirit, pluck and strength of the DPRK and was a solemn declaration of the great Paektusan nation that no one in the world can match the DPRK.
					
					 It went on:
					
					 The days have gone never to return when the U.S. imperialists threatened the use of nuclear weapons against the DPRK.
					
					 When flags of surrender were presented to the U.S. imperialists in different parts of the world, the DPRK dealt with them, the chief architect of illegal and outrageous acts, by dint of its strong arms, and has emerged as the strongest nuclear weapons state with H-bombs.
					
					 Another article titled "Stand of national independence is a fundamental way of achieving Korea's reunification" was posted on the website.

articles.title: Preparatory Committee for 2017 Meeting Praising Great Persons of Mt. Paektu Formed by Nigerian Political Party
articles.content:
Preparatory Committee for 2017 Meeting Praising Great Persons of Mt. Paektu Formed by Nigerian Political Party
 Pyongyang, March 8 (KCNA) -- A preparatory committee of the People's Progressive Party of Nigeria for the 2017 Meeting Praising Great Persons of Mt. Paektu was formed in Abuja on Feb. 29.
					 The national chairman of the People's Progressive Party of Nigeria was elected chairman of the preparatory committee. 
					
					 The committee decided to organize colorful political and cultural events praising the revolutionary careers and feats of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il and the wise leadership of Marshal Kim Jong Un who is successfully steering the building of a thriving nation on the occasion of the Day of the Sun and the Day of the Shining Star (birth anniversaries of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il) in 2017.

articles.title: Swedish Magazine Introduces DPRK
articles.content:
Swedish Magazine Introduces DPRK
 Pyongyang, March 8 (KCNA) -- The Sweden-Korea Friendship Association released its magazine Korea Information No. 1 on February 28.
					 The magazine told in detail about the enlarged joint meeting of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK) and the Korean People's Army Committee of the WPK guided by supreme leader Kim Jong Un.
					
					 It noted in an article titled "Nuclear test of DPRK counteracts U.S. threat":
					
					 The DPRK's first H-bomb test on January 6 was a self-defensive measure to defend peace on the Korean peninsula and security of the region from the U.S. and its followers' daily-increasing nuclear threat.
					
					 The U.S. and its followers are running amuck to stifle the DPRK.
					
					 The U.S. is only escalating tensions on the peninsula.
					
					 All the countries including Sweden should make efforts to remove the danger of war being increased on the peninsula due to the U.S.
					
					 The magazine noted in an article that the DPRK successfully launched the earth observation satellite Kwangmyongsong-4 on February 7, adding that to take issue with it is a violation of the UN Charter.
					
					 Other articles disclosed that the U.S. imperialists and the south Korean puppet group are aggravating tensions on the peninsula and in the region, taking issue with the DPRK over its satellite launch and getting pronounced in their aggressive moves against it.

articles.title: Angolan Organization Stresses on Just Cause of Korean People
articles.content:
Angolan Organization Stresses on Just Cause of Korean People
 Pyongyang, March 8 (KCNA) -- The just cause of the Korean people for building a prosperous country and realizing the independent reunification of the country will surely emerge victorious.
					 The Committee of Angola for Friendship and Solidarity with Peoples said this in a statement on March 1.
					
					 The statement noted that the situation on the Korean peninsula reached the brink of war owing to the reckless provocation of hostile forces.
					
					 The recent crucial statement of the Supreme Command of the Korean People's Army reflected the firm will of the Korean people to preserve the sovereignty of the nation and the right to existence. 
					
					 We highly estimate the Korean people in their indomitable fighting spirit for defending the sovereignty of the country and extend support and solidarity to it.

articles.title: Int'l Body Slams S. Korean Puppet Forces' Misrule
articles.content:
Int'l Body Slams S. Korean Puppet Forces' Misrule
 Pyongyang, March 8 (KCNA) -- The Korean Friendship Association headquartered in Spain recently posted on its website One Korea Network an article criticizing the misrule of the Park Geun Hye regime of south Korea.
					 Giving a detailed account about jobless youths in south Korea, the most serious problem caused by the Park regime, the article said:
					
					 The worst crisis of unemployed youths is a result of the unpopular misrule of the south Korean authorities helping only big businesses rake up profits by sacrificing workers.
					
					 No wonder, the south Korean youth are labeling their society a "veritable hell."
					
					 South Korean people are struggling against the authorities, condemning the present chief executive.
					
					 An article disclosing the south Korean war maniacs' moves for the confrontation with the DPRK was also posted.

articles.title: Acto central por 106o aniversario del Dia Internacional de la Mujer
articles.content:
Acto central por 106o aniversario del Dia Internacional de la Mujer
Pyongyang, 8 de marzo (ACNC) -- Tuvo lugar el dia 8 en el capitalino Palacio Cultural del Pueblo el acto central por el Dia Internacional de la Mujer.
					Asistieron Choe Ryong Hae, Yang Hyong Sop y otros cudros, las funcionarias e integrantes de la UMDC en esta capital. 
					
					Fueron invitadas las compatriotas residentes en ultramar, las mujeres de las representaciones diplomaticas y de organizaciones internacionales acreditadas en la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y huespedes extranjeros. 
					
					El informe de la ocasion estuvo a cargo de Choe Ryong Hae, miembro del Buro Politico y secretario del Comite Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea. 
					
					El informante dijo que durante el periodo de mas de un siglo que datan de la institucion del Dia Internacional de la Mujer, las mujeres progresistas del mundo han venido luchando por la verdadera paz y democracia y por los autenticos derechos y dignidad de si mismas y se ha logrado un gran avance en el desarrollo del movimiento femenino mundial. 
					
					Recordo que el movimiento femenino coreano, allanado bajo la direccion del Presidente Kim Il Sung y el Dirigente Kim Jong Il, ha registrado victorias junto con el trayecto glorioso de la revolucion coreana. 
					
					En el fragor de la lucha revolucionaria antijaponesa el Presidente Kim Il Sung presento la original idea sobre el movimiento femenino, dio origen al autoctono movimiento femenino coreano y preparo su brillante tradicion. 
					
					Despues de la liberacion del pais, organizo la Union de Mujeres Democraticas de Corea abarcando a las amplias masas femeninas y promulgo la ley de igualdad de derechos del hombre y la mujer por primera vez en la historia. 
					
					Publico muchas obras para resolver finalmente el problema femenino y condujo sabiamente las labores para el respecto. 
					
					En la historia del movimiento femenino coreano estan impregnadas las imperecederas hazanas de la destacada dirigente del movimiento femenino coreano Kang Pan Sok y la Heroina de la Lucha Antijaponesa Kim Jong Suk, quienes dedicaron todos los suyos por la liberacion social de las mujeres.
					
					El Dirigente Kim Jong Il defendio y glorifico la idea y las proezas de direccion del Presidente en materia del movimiento femenino y desarrollo en una nueva etapa elevada el movimiento femenino coreano. 
					
					Hoy dia, este movimiento acoge la nueva era dorada de su desarrollo bajo la orientacion del Mariscal Kim Jong Un. 
					
					Las mujeres deben contribuir a abrir la era de esplendor en la construccion de un Estado prospero socialista y levantar en este territorio patrio la potencia digna, prospera y reunificada.
					
					Y bajo el ideal de la independencia, la paz y la amistad, deben consolidar mas la unidad y la solidaridad internacionales con las mujeres progresistas del mundo que lucha por la dignidad y derechos de las mujeres y por la paz y la estabilidad del mundo.

articles.title: Efectuado acto por dia de futbol femenino de CAF 2016
articles.content:
Efectuado acto por dia de futbol femenino de CAF 2016
Pyongyang, 8 de marzo (ACNC) -- Tuvo lugar en la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea el acto dedicado al dia de futbol femenino de la Confederacion Asiatica de Futbol 2016.
					Tomaron parte en la ocasion las entrenadoras y maestras de varios conjuntos deportivos, las escuelas deportivas de jovenes y ninos escolares y la Escuela Internacional de Futbol de Pyongyang, y las ameritadas futbolisticas coreanas.
					
					Hubo el cursillo sobre la tendencia de desarrollo de futbol femenino mundial y el papel de entrenadoras y maestras en la competencia y la formacion de reservas y la proyeccion de un multimedia sobre competencia internacional.
					
					A continuacion, las participantes realizaron la competencia de futbol dividida en 2 equipos.
					
					Segun Pang Yong Su, subsecretario general de la Asociacion de Futbol de Corea, desde el ano pasado, el 8 de marzo se definio como dia de futbol femenino de la CAF. Con motivo de ese dia, las asociaciones futbolisticas de varios paises desarrollan variadas labores para el desarrollo de futbol femenino.
					
					Ri Kum Suk, deportista del Pueblo, tomo la decision de dedicar toda su inteligencia y pasion para el desarrollo de futbol femenino del pais.

articles.title: Periodicos condenan simulacros conjuntos Key Resolve y Foal Eagle
articles.content:
Periodicos condenan simulacros conjuntos Key Resolve y Foal Eagle
Pyongyang, 8 de marzo (ACNC) -- Los periodicos de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea condenaron este martes los ejercicios belicos conjuntos Estados Unidos.-Sur de Corea Key Resolve y Foal Eagle 16.
					El diario Rodong Sinmun, en su articulo individual, califica los presentes simulacros de una aventura que perturba la paz de la Peninsula Coreana y la estabilidad del Nordeste Asiatico y aumenta extremadamente el peligro de la guerra nuclear, y continua:
					
					El presente alboroto belico no es un simple simulacro sino engendra el peligro de la segunda guerra coreana, la nuclear. 
					
					Los belicistas amenazan abiertamente a la RPDC dando a la publicidad los pertrechos de guerra movilizados en los ejercicios belicos e insistiendo en la introduccion de las fuerzas armadas para el combate especial y la "movilizacion total de armas de terror" y la "ocupacion de toda la extension norcoreana". 
					
					Los simulacros Key Resolve y Foal Eagle de mayor dimension llevaran indudablemente las relaciones intercoreanas al borde de la guerra. 
					
					No observaremos con brazados cruzados las maniobras de guerra de agresion de EE.UU. y los titeres surcoreanos que perturban la paz de la Peninsula Coreana y obstaculizan la causa de reunificacion pacifica de Corea. 
					
					Ahora los medios estrategicos y tacticos de ataque de las fuerzas armadas revolucionarias del monte Paektu esperan la orden de batalla final observando con alta vigilancia la locura de los provocadores. 
					
					El periodico Minju Joson tambien divulgo un comentario individual enfatizando que el ejercito y pueblo coreanos haran probar la guerra de verdad a los agresores y belicistas que se desesperan sin juicio para obtener sus designios agresivos.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun rechaza la fabricacion de "ley de prevencion de terrorismo" de Sur de Corea
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun rechaza la fabricacion de "ley de prevencion de terrorismo" de Sur de Corea
Pyongyang, 8 de marzo (ACNC) -- El pasado dia 2, a instigacion de la traidora Park Geun-hye, el Partido Saenuri del Sur de Corea aprobo a la fuerza en la "Asamblea Nacional" la "ley de prevencion de terrorismo" so pretexto de hacer frente al "terrorismo", a pesar de la fuerte protesta de los habitantes de diversos estratos.
					En un comentario individual del dia 8, el diario Rodong Sinmun lo califica de una intolerable provocacion politica a la RPDC y proceder fascista para manchar la imagen prestigiosa de la RPDC y exterminar despiadadamente a las fuerzas progresistas y democraticas surcoreanas tildandolas de "terroristas". 
					
					La "ley" en cuestion es la mas espantosa en la historia de derecho del Sur de Corea.
					
					La "ley de prevencion del terrorismo" fue sometida a la consideracion de la "Asamblea Nacional" ya en 2001 y se quedo en papel mojado por la fuerte protesta de diferentes circulos. 
					
					Sin embargo, la horda de Park Geun-hye fabrico por fin ese infame ley infundiendo el panico de "terrorismo" en toda la sociedad cuestionando las medidas de fortalecimiento del disuasivo nuclear autodefensivo y la ejecucion del derecho legitimo al desarrollo espacial de la RPDC. 
					
					La verdadera intencion de la traidora Park es desviar la atencion de la poblacion al enfrentamiento Norte-Sur y mantener su dominacion dictatorial y el "poder" conservador.
					
					Para ese fin, rehabilita la segunda era de "Yusin" instigando el Servicio Nacional de Inteligencia a reprimir atrozmente a los moradores, como lo hizo su padre. 
					
					Con ningun pretexto se puede justificar el fascismo y la dictadura.
